page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMILY.
page.content: At about 7p.m. my mum comes in and wakes me up.We have to arrive at school by 8p.m. as my dad is the headmaster.Our school is a small school with only two classrooms. School starts at 9p.m.On Thursday the girls go swimming with Chedworth school.At the moment,Iam working to take my Bronze Survival badge.We get back from swimming at 10.45.and I play with Clare and Sarah.After play we watch "Near and Far"on television and talk about it.We have an hour for lunch and play which starts at 12.00.I have a packed lunch.After lunch we have French and Music.Music is one of my favourite subjects.As our school is a church school we always say a prayer before we go home at 3.15p.m.
